argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ceqsalg.1 | |- F/ x ps |
| 2 |  | ceqsalg.2 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ax-gen | |- A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_bj-ceqsalt | |- ( ( F/ x ps /\ A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) /\ A e. V ) -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_mp3an12 | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ bj-ceqsalg .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
